document_data.name: Wieldskill
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wieldskill''''' was a [[divination]] [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s. This spell originated from [[Gond]] the Wonderbringer.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell granted the caster a hint of divine guidance. The effect typically manifested by either temporarily enhancing the caster's proficiency with a known skill, or by granting them rudimentary knowledge of an unknown skill. This also applied to the use of weapons.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
